thread.section_title: Cook Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cook Travel | www.cooktravel.net
thread.title: Alex Zerbone
thread.title_full: Cook Travel reviewed by Alex Zerbone

author: Alex Zerbone
title: Alex Zerbone
text:
I have been dealing with Fabrizio Peralta at Cook Travel for over 5 years, he has always found the best biz class fare and itinerary even on a last minute request for travel to Europe and Asia. I emailed him at 10:00 pm with a request and he responded!!! unbelievable support and knowledge.
Thanks Fabrizio
